其實我都會照報埋bachelor 不過最好就入到PDLA啦 讀少三年

My friend Joe loves gardening. In his front garden he planted a litchi tree, two mango trees and bushes in the lawn. Some of the bushes produce beautiful trumpet-shaped flowers. He also grew flowers such as roses, orchids, violets, hydrangeas, lavender and sunflowers which are in full bloom. There're some exquisite flowerpots placed near the lawn as decoration. He mows the grass every now and then. He occasionally hires a gardener to manicure his garden. His back garden is enormous which is two thousand five hundred square foot in size. It used to be a lawn but he turned it into a meadow which are blanketed with wild flowers and exotic flowers. Some of the flower buds haven't opened yet but as the weather gets warmer the flowers open. Even inside her house she has a vase of hydrangeas and a few potted plants, some of which are just coming into bloom. Orchids can be cultivated in flower pots or vases. In summer, summer flowers bloom in the meadow. In spring the meadow is covered with pretty spring flowers. In autumn the meadow is blanketed in lovely autumn flowers. In winter the meadow is a mass of beautiful winter flowers. It's an extraordinary garden. He buys a bouquet of red roses, hydrangea and sunflowers for his girlfriend every valentine's day. They're pretty cut flowers. Some women seem to bloom in their mid-thirties. For example Tracy has bloomed into an utterly beautiful creature in her thirties. She's a travel agent who gets an hourly wage of ninety three dollars plus a twenty five percent commission on every sale she makes so her job isn't by commission only. So far this year her sales haven't fulfilled her expectation partly because the economy is hardly blooming.
